Key Match Events: India posted their highest total against Bangladesh even after losing three wickets in the powerplay
Nitish Kumar Reddy and Rinku Singh added 108 for the fourth wicket
Hardik Pandya and Riyan Parag struck meaty blows at the death
Pre-Game Insights: India could give a chance to Ravi Bishnoi, Tilak Verma, Jitesh Sharma and Harshit Rana
Bangladesh have a long discussion ahead of them to replace Mahmudullah in the T20I side
India will be keen to stretch their dominance against Bangladesh to the absolute
Miscellaneous Highlights: India extended their unbeaten run in the bilateral T20I series at home to 16
India used seven bowlers and each took at least one wicket in Delhi
Bangladesh's spinners conceded 14.75 runs per over in Delhi, their most expensive collective performance in a T20I
Others: There's a forecast of rain in Hyderabad on Saturday
In IPL 2024, the three sides who made 200-plus batting first at the Rajiv Gandhi International Stadium won the game
